sentence.text: However, the function and mechanism underlying the action of UCA1 in papillary thyroid cancer (biological_process) remains unclear.

UCA1 knockdown significantly inhibited biological_process cell viability, colony formation and the bromodomain containing 4 (positive regulation of transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter) expression level in vitro, and retarded PTC tumor growth in vivo.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter

sentence.text: In the previous study, microRNA (protein polyubiquitination)‑204 inhibited thyroid cancer progression and was regulated by UCA1 in other types of cancer.
